root.name: Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force
root.description: OverviewAlexander Alexandria MunroIn the single player campaign, the player takes on the role of Ensign Munro, whose gender can be selected at the game's start, in a number of levels that more or less play out like an episode of the television series that it's made for. As part as the "Hazard Team" Munro is sent out to do the dirty work of collecting info, finding supplies and figure out just what is going on when the ship needs you to.GameplayWelcome to the bridge of the U.S.S. VoyagerRight from the beginning, the player is thrust into the action as part of that Hazard team with a few AI controlled partners on a mission to learn where the Voyager star ship is and why it has gotten there. Various weapons are at Munro's disposal to take out enemies and aside from the odd keycode puzzle it's more or less a shoot first ask later scenario.Various enemies will try to stop Munro's efforts, but allies are also met along the way as well. Some of the early levels are set on the Voyager star ship and also feature a number of the characters from the TV series.The game's multiplayer features access to a 12-15 maps, all the character models of the game, as well as all the weapons and a variety of customization options.
